Watson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs short and Butt siezes on it, pulling forward of square leg to the boundary to bring up the 50 partnership for the 5th wicket - good resistance this even if it is a little slow

Watson to Salman Butt, no run edges a drive and North dives to his right and puts down the tough chance, he looks to be a fraction deep there. It was catchable for sure - funny how the ball follows you when you are a b
Watson to Salman Butt, no run drives out to point
Bollinger to Malik, no run defends off the back foot towards point
Bollinger to Malik, no run comes forward to a widish ball, played to cover point
Bollinger to Malik, no run comes forward and drives to mid off
Bollinger to Malik, no run comes forward again, pushing out to cover
Bollinger to Malik, no run leaves a good length ball outside off, taken by Haddin
Bollinger to Malik, no run drives a full ball to mid off, finds the fielder - back to back maidens from big Dougie
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run leaves an arm ball which didn't come in a lot
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run leaves again outside off
Hauritz to Salman Butt, FOUR runs wide and a lofted drive makes the ropes in front of the scoreboard hill - well flighted, good to see him toss them up. Butt struck that quite well.
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run comes forward in defence
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run plays out to deep cover point
Hauritz to Malik, 3 runs short outside off, cuts it away off the edge behind point - Dougie chases but it is an easy three
Bollinger to Malik, no run leaves one outside off that angles in a bit
Bollinger to Malik, no run plays back to one that might have done him a bit for pace, manages to keep it out though - good ball there from Bolliger
Bollinger to Malik, no run pushes forward and misses outside off, the ball leaving him off the pitch a fraction
Bollinger to Malik, no run makes contact this time, driving to mid off
Bollinger to Malik, no run short, in at the ribs - defends to the on-side
Bollinger to Malik, no run comes forward in defence, out to cover
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run leaves one outside off, that shave the stumps
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run leaves again outside off, a bit wider
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run pushes forward, it goes into a gap at cover point but neither batsman is keen for the single
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run cuts behind point and North makes an excellent save at backward point
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run comes forward and defends to short cover
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run defends again coming forward
Bollinger to Malik, 1 run straight and is rushed as he plays to long leg off the inside edge of the bat, first run off Bollinger for 19 balls
Bollinger to Salman Butt, FOUR runs short outside off and is cut superbly behind point, Clarke chases but realises he won't get near it - shot of the day today so far
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run plays back and is hit high on the pad, good follow up from the bowler
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run defends off the back foot into the off side
Bollinger to Salman Butt, FOUR runs short outside off and is uppercut over gully, class shot - Butt's knock is now that highest by a Pakistani in this series
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run comes forward and gets a thick edge on the bounce to gully
Hauritz to Malik, no run comes forward in defence back to the bowler

Hauritz to Malik, no run stays in the crease this time, comes forward in defence

Hauritz to Malik, no run comes forward in defence again, played back to the bowler
Hauritz to Malik, no run comes forward in defence - 2 overs to go now before the players take Lunch
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run drives to mid off
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run comes forward and defends a ball to cover, that perhaps tailed in a little bit
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run short, bouncer length outside off, perhaps cutable, but decides again risking it so close to Lunch
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run goes back in defence to one that keeps a bit low, gets an inside edge that goes near the stumps
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run goes back in defence this time, plays it to mid on

Hauritz to Malik, no run defends, coming forward

Hauritz to Malik, no run comes forward in defence, up the on side of the pitch

Johnson to Salman Butt, 1 run works one of his hip to deep square leg
Johnson to Malik, no run plays back in defence
Johnson to Malik, no run plays from the crease and defends to gully
Johnson to Malik, no run goes back and across, defending to the bowler
Johnson to Malik, no run again tight in defence, plays towards mid on

Hauritz to Malik, 2 runs plays away behind point, Johnson misfields and they get a couple

Johnson to Salman Butt, no run ducks out of the way of another short one

Johnson to Malik, no run comes forward and defends towards cover
Johnson to Malik, 1 run drives out to deep point to raise his fifty - 123 balls with 9 fours - a simple raise of the bat from Shoaib Malik
Johnson to Salman Butt, 1 run worked off his pads through forward squaree leg - 10 from the over with 5 more overs to the new ball
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run drives a full ball out to cover

Hauritz to Salman Butt, 2 runs drives wide of cover and that's his 100, he raises his bat and gets a nice round of applause for his 3rd Test ton - he embraces Malik - faced 230 balls with 17 fours, well batted

Katich to Salman Butt, no run tries to sweep and misses, Haddin fumbles but Clarke gathers on the rebound

Bollinger to Umar Gul, 2 runs drives nicely back past the bowler - Gul only wants two to keep the strike

Watson and Katich scurry off and that is a clear indication that Australia HAS NOT enforced the follow-on. Back in 10 minutes for the start of the Aussie second innings. 18 overs left today - That's it from me today, David Wa
Innings Start
That's it from me today - Lawrie Colliver handing over the David Walsh for the next period of play in this Test Match which is 6 wickets away from being Australia's
